course.title: Becoming Mom
course.subtitle: Your Free Introduction to Postpartum Wellness
course.description: A gentle introduction to understanding and navigating the emotional journey of new motherhood
course.long_description: This free course offers new and expecting mothers a compassionate introduction to postpartum wellness. Through 4 foundational lessons, you'll gain insights into the physical and emotional changes of motherhood, learn essential self-care strategies, and discover when and how to seek support. Perfect for those exploring their options or wanting a taste of our comprehensive programs.

prompts: What brought you to this course today?
What emotions are you experiencing most often?
What do you hope to gain from this journey?
What physical changes have surprised you most?
How has your thinking or memory changed?
What self-care practice could you commit to this week?
Who are the key people in your support network?
What kind of help is hardest for you to ask for?
What boundaries do you need to set?
